actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands to transfer to the Virgin Island Government title to all property in the Virgin Islands which may have been acquired by the United States from Denmark under a specified convention. Excludes from such transfer certain lands and property already reserved or retained by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Revised Organic Act of the Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.
